metadata.title: CVE-2017-2378 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. The issue involves bookmarkcreation in the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers to executearbitrary code or spoof a bookmark by leveraging mishandling of linksduring drag-and-drop actions.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
